Description:
Some careers have more impact than others.If you’re looking for a career where you can make a real impression, join HSBC and discover how valued you’ll be.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organizations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realize their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role MI & Business Support Manager.Principal responsibilities:The jobholder will be required to manage one or more assignments/projects with some level of complexity and scope.
MI & Business Support Manager will be responsible for liaising and working with all functions under VP-GSC Hyd Collections cluster to help enhance operational effectiveness.
MI & Business Support Manager will be responsible for identifying opportunities, trends, initiatives and tactics from daily management of production KPIs, and escalating these to the relevant areas to support financial and enhanced customer service goals in line with optimization and strategy aims.
MI & Business Support Manager responsible for performance analysis and driving key projects in coordination with stakeholders to develop and deploy more effective strategies that help deliver the Bank's strategic plan and facilitate bad debt savings and cost reduction.
Role holder will be driving the change agenda for Hyd Collections
Role Holder will be expected to proactively identify improvement opportunities and drive solutions into actionable strategic plans..
Role Holder will be responsible for ensuring that robust reporting structure which is aligned to Global Standards
Ensure effective and appropriate structure and format in place for MI, which fully and accurately represents achievement of key business deliverables.
Effective communication with peers in terms of best practice sharing to ensure that optimum use of resource is made across the sections.
Continuous review of MI and produce the same in a specific format, which is easily comprehended by business units.
They may be required to manage several projects involving interaction with several business areas across Collections.Job Details
